Known as the "Stuka", this famous aircraft boasts excellent dive-bombing performance with its distinctive inverse gullwing design. It is known as the "Siren of the Devil" due to the siren-like wind noise produced when it dives.
新型軽巡のために開発された新型の両用砲です。\n対巡洋艦戦闘に重きをおいた新設計: A new type of dual-purpose gun developed for a new class of light cruisers. It was a new design of light cruiser guns that emphasized combat with other cruisers but also possessed limited anti-air capabilities. It was equipped on the Agano-class light cruisers.
新開発の長8cm高角砲です。\n秋月型に装備された長10cm高角砲の小型軽量化を: This is the new long 8 cm high-angle gun. It is a miniaturized and lightened anti-air secondary gun version of the Akizuki-class's long 10 cm high angle gun. While it is evaluated to be of little improvement, it was anticipated by the warships built later into the war.
伊号潜水艦の艦首に装備する潜水艦の主兵装です。\n水上艦艇に搭載するものよりやや: This torpedo is the primary weapon of the I- submarines. While smaller than the torpedoes of surface ships, it still is renowned for its incredible range and deadly firepower. It could inflict severe damage even against larger warships.
大発動艇、略して「大発」。\n輸送船からの揚陸作業や上陸戦に用いた、現代でいうと: Daihatsu-class landing craft, or "Daihatsu" for short. In modern times, it's called a "landing craft" and used for landing troops and materiel. Daihatsu could be operated from amphibious assault ships and the like. It was known as the "Truck of the Sea".
陸軍で開発、運用されていたオートジャイロ「カ号観測機」。\n現代の艦載ヘリコプタ: The "Ka-type observation autogyro" was developed and used by the military. This rotorcraft was used for anti-submarine patrol similar to modern ship-borne helicopters. This aircraft can launch from landing craft and light carriers with full-length decks as well as from aviation cruisers and battleships with flight decks.
陸軍で開発、対潜哨戒機としても運用されていた固定翼機で\nす。\n現代のSTOL: A fixed-wing aircraft developed by the Army operated as an anti-submarine patrol aircraft. Similar to modern STOL (Short Take-Off and Landing) aircraft, this plane is shipborne as an anti-submarine patrol aircraft. It can be operated on amphibious assault ships and light aircraft carriers with flight deck.
「長10cm」と呼ばれた長砲身の新型高性能防空用高角砲、そ\nの大型艦対空火器バ: The "Long 10 cm" new long gun barrel, which was called the high-performance air defense high-angle gun, is a large ship-to-air secondary firearm. Unable to be mass produced because of the complicated structure, it is the trump card for fleet air defense to protect your precious fleet from aerial attacker. Whether aircraft carrier or battleship, you can operate this as a large ship secondary gun.
艦艇の防御力を強化する増加装甲の一種です。\n重巡洋艦以上の中型艦艇の船体側面へ: This anti-torpedo bulge is a type of add-on armor for warships. This can be mounted on the hulls of medium-sized ships like heavy cruisers. (Useable by heavy cruisers, aviation cruisers, light carriers, and seaplane tenders)
艦艇の防御力を強化する増加装甲の一種です。\n戦艦等の大型艦艇の船体側面への増設: This is a type of armor add-on used by warships. It can be mounted on the hulls of battleships or any other large warships. (Useable by battleships, fast battleships, aviation battleships, standard carriers (including armored ones))
夜戦時照射用の探照灯です。\n夜戦時に味方艦隊の射撃・雷撃を支援できますが、敵艦: This is a searchlight used to illuminate ships during night battle. While this can assist other friendly ships in attacking the enemy during night battle, the enemy may focus their fire on the user. (This can be used aboard destroyers, light cruisers, heavy cruisers, and aviation cruisers, seaplane tenders, and battlecruisers)
ドラム缶を繋いだ簡易輸送用部材です。\"東京急行\"などに用い\nられました。\: A simple transportation component that connects drums. It was used for supply runs like the "Tokyo Express". It is loaded on destroyers' decks and transported through enemy-controlled waters. (Useable by destroyers, light cruisers, aviation cruisers, seaplane tenders, and landing ships)
ビスマルク級戦艦に搭載された、かの国の戦艦主砲です。\n主に電動を用いた砲塔旋回: This is a battleship main gun from that country that was mounted on the Bismarck-class battleships. Its traverse, ammunition hoist, and loading mechanisms were primarily electric-powered. It is a battleship main armament meant for short to medium-range artillery combat.
ビスマルク級戦艦に搭載された、かの国の戦艦副砲です。\n主に近距離へ接近する小艦: This is a battleship secondary gun from that country, mounted on the Bismarck-class battleships. Its job is to engage small vessels at close range with direct fire. Ship fire-control system has been enhanced, but the low attack angle of the gun makes it unsuitable for surface-to-air combat.
Z1型駆逐艦に搭載された、かの国の駆逐艦主砲です。\n単装砲ではありますが、対艦: This was the main gun of destroyers from that country, it was equipped on the Z1-class destroyers. Although it was just a single-mount, it was a good gun for anti-ship and anti-ground shelling. Unfortunately, this gun is unsuited for anti-air combat.
急降下爆撃も可能な多用途水上偵察機「瑞雲」。\n「伊勢」型航空戦艦等での艦隊運用: The "Zuiun" was a multirole reconnaissance seaplane capable of carrying out dive-bombing. This Zuiun belongs to the 634th Air Group, grouped and trained for practical application on aircraft-carrying battleships such as Ise and Hyuuga.
急降下爆撃まで可能な多用途水上偵察機「瑞雲」。\n空戦フラップ装備の高性能多用途: The "Zuiun" was a multirole reconnaissance seaplane capable of carrying out dive-bombing. This is a state-of-the-art "Zuiun Kai Model" high-performance multi-purpose plane equipped with air combat flaps, had its engine replaced with the more powerful Venus 62 type engine.
高性能多用途水上偵察機「瑞雲」の改良型「瑞雲12型」。\n同機によって編成された: The "Zuiun Model 12" is an improved, high-performance version of the "Zuiun" reconnaissance seaplane. This is the "Zuiun Model 12", belonging to the 634th Air Group, responsible for fleet operations of those seaplanes on the "Ise-class" aviation battleships.
初期の機動部隊を支えた主力攻撃機「九七艦攻」。\n旧式化した同機を対潜哨戒機バー: The "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber" was the main attacker in the early days of the Carrier Task Force. This "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber" saw service with the 931st Air Group for anti-submarine warfare duties.
登場の遅れた名艦上攻撃機「天山」。\nこの機体を用いて対潜哨戒・対潜制圧・対艦攻: The "Tenzan" was a carrier-based attack aircraft that was delayed into service. This "Tenzan" saw service with the 931st Air Group where they were used for anti-submarine patrols and warfare, and surface warfare operations.
かの国からもたらされた四連装対空機銃です。\n2cm Flakvierling3: A quad mount anti-air turret brought over from that country. An excellent air defense weapon known as the 2 cm Flakvierling 38, it was not only used on ships but also on land vehicles.
かの国からもたらされた大口径二連装高射機関砲です。\n主に陸戦で用いられましたが: A large caliber twin anti-aircraft gun that was brought from another country. It was primarily used on land, but was also mounted on U-boats and ships too. It will provide a great amount of proximity air defense.
工作艦に搭載される修理装備一式です。「明石」等の工作艦に\n搭載することで、入渠: A set of ship repair facilities used aboard repair ships. When used on repair ships such as "Akashi", it can perform anchorage repairs on other ships without having to dock them. (This set of equipment can repair +1 ship with minor damage at the same time.)
次世代駆逐艦などに搭載するための高温高圧缶です。\n従来の艦本式ロ号缶と比べて、: A high-temperature, high-pressure boiler to be equipped by next-generation destroyers. Its performance has been drastically improved compared to conventional Kampon boilers. It impressively increases evasion by itself, and will improve even more when combined with an Improved Steam Turbine.
実戦運用された電探二号電波探信儀二型の改良型です。\n新型受信機や様々な改良によ: This radar is a newer version of the Type 22 surface radar. It received a new receiver plus other things, making its performance and reliability better. It also became an improved fire control system allowing more accurate shooting.
二式二号電波探信儀一型の改良型です。\n様々な改良と調整によって、安定性が向上し: This is the twin improved version of the Type 21 air radar. Various things have been improved, increasing its reliability. Primarily used as an air search radar, it can also be used as a surface search radar.
20.3cm連装砲のマイナーバージョンアップ版、それが同2号\n連装砲です。\n: The no.2 twin gun is a slightly upgraded version of the 20.3 cm twin gun. The excellent heavy cruiser main guns were upgraded and used as the main guns of the Myoukou-class. Other heavy cruisers had their early-model guns eventually replaced with this one during their modernizations.
標準的な対空高角砲の後期改良型です。\n量産に向いた構造で経済性も高く、量産両用: A late-model, improved version of the standard anti-air high-angle gun. It had a design that lent itself to mass production and low costs. This resulted in a mass-produced high-angle gun that boasted good performance. It is a reliable anti-air weapon that has improved rotation speed.
英国ヴィッカース社より導入した対空機銃です。\n射撃時の音からポンポン砲とも呼ば: This is an anti-aircraft autocannon introduced by the British Vickers company. Also known as the pom-pom gun due to its firing sound for its two-round burst, it was produced under license in Japan. It was gradually replaced by more modern domestically produced anti-aircraft machine guns.
優れた航続距離を誇り、速度や防弾装備は劣るものの、初期の\n機動部隊艦載機の主力: The "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber" was the mainstay attack aircraft during the early days of the Carrier Task Force, renowned for its operational range despite being slow and unarmored. This squadron was led by Commander Tomonaga who was spirited and highly skilled.
旧式化した「九七艦攻」の後継機として開発された、新鋭艦上\n攻撃機「天山」。本部: The "Tenzan" is a carrier-based torpedo bomber developed as a successor to the obsolete "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber". This squadron, made up of a select group of skilled pilots, transitioned to the new "Tenzan" and was led by a spirited Air Group commander.
伊号潜水艦の艦首に装備する潜水艦専用兵装です。\n水上艦艇に搭載するものよりやや: This is a submarine-only weapon to equip along the bow of submarines. Slightly smaller in diameter than those to be mounted on surface ships, the oxygen torpedo tubes ship pack 8 tubes of deadly, long-range high-accuracy oxygen torpedoes. It will add a high torpedo firepower to submarines.
熟練搭乗員で構成された「零式艦上戦闘機」装備の艦戦隊で\nす。7.7mm機銃2門: "Zero carrier-borne fighters" used by skilled pilots. It boasts incredible agility and long operational range and has two 7.7 mm machine guns on the engine cowling and two 20 mm cannons at the wings. In the hands of a skilled pilot, it can be a deadly adversary in the early times. This aircraft also patrols and guards the airspace of the fleet.
熟練搭乗員で構成された「九九艦爆」装備の艦爆隊です。\n「九七艦攻」と共に初期機: This particular "Type 99 Dive Bomber" was used by skilled pilots. Along with the "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber", it was the core of the initial task force's striking power. Although it has high availability and reliability, it was a low-speed, fixed-leg aircraft with a somewhat outdated design, being gradually replaced by the more capable high-speed "Suisei" naval bomber.
熟練搭乗員で構成された「九七艦攻」装備の艦攻隊です。\n速度や防弾装備は劣るもの: This particular "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber" was used by skilled pilots. While slow and unarmored, it had great operational range and in the hands of skilled aircrews, played an important role in the task force during the breakout of hostilities. Capable of torpedo runs and horizontal bombing against enemy ships, it was gradually phased out from active service.
緒戦の空母機動部隊の打撃力の中核を担う「九九艦爆」。\nやや設計の古い固定脚低速: The "Type 99 Dive Bomber" formed the backbone of strike groups of the carrier task force at the beginning of hostilities. Despite being of old design with a slow speed and fixed landing gear, it has high availability and reliability, especially when used by the veteran Captain Egusa renowned for its impressive dive bombing accuracy.
「九九艦爆」の後継機として開発された高速艦爆「彗星」。\n液冷発動機装備のため運: The "Suisei" is a high-speed dive bomber developed to replace the "Type 99 Dive Bomber". Despite teething problems with the engine and the airframe, the Egusa Squadron with its Air Group commander, supported by skilled maintenance crews of frontline carriers, paved the way for the "Suisei" to achieve an outstanding dive bombing accuracy rate for the next generation of the Carrier Task Force
主砲等から発射される落下傘付の照明弾です。\n夜戦時において敵艦隊付近を照明し、: A flare with a parachute fired from a main gun. During night battles, it illuminates the vicinity of the enemy fleet and supports the night attacks of the allied fleet (it also slightly suppresses the occurrence of nighttime special attacks by the enemy fleet).
水雷戦隊旗艦用に開発された水上夜間偵察機です。\n長時間の滞空性能を持つ黒く塗装: This is a night reconnaissance seaplane developed for torpedo squadron flagships. The airframe is painted black has a skilled crew with excellent night-time detection ability, and can stay in the air for long periods of time (if conditions are right, "night contact" may occur to support night battles).
高速戦艦に搭載するための新開発の試製戦艦主砲です。\n「金剛」型高速戦艦の代替新: A newly developed prototype main battleship armament intended to be equipped on fast battleships. This triple-mounted 35.6 cm gun was planned to be for the successor to the "Kongou-class" fast battleships. It is slightly smaller and lighter than other large-caliber guns. Its firepower and accuracy have been significantly improved compared to the original 35.6 cm guns. Please try putting this to use after you've upgraded your fast battleships!
金剛型高速戦艦「榛名」の前部主砲の最終形態です。\nあまり効果がなかったといわれ: The final version of the forward battery of the Kongou-class fast battleship "Haruna". Although it was of questionable efficacy, the turret was given a zebra-striped pattern dazzle camouflage. Loaded with the Type 3 shell and facing the skies dominated by enemy aircraft, it did its best to defend the remaining fleet trapped in Kure Harbour.
呉海軍工廠砲熕部で試作された純国産戦艦主砲の三連装砲で\nす。\n16インチを僅: A triple-mounted domestic battleship main gun prototyped by Kure Naval Arsenal's Artillery Division. At a little over 16 inches, this 41 cm gun was the largest battleship gun in the world until the introduction of the "Yamato-class" 46 cm guns. When equipped on the Nagato-class battleships, they would have had firepower and accuracy far exceeding that of any "Big 7" from the other great powers.
艦載用対空電探の改良調整版です。\n比較的信頼性も高く、小型軽量で駆逐艦等への装: This is an improved version of the radar intended for use aboard warships. While the "Type 13 Air Radar" is reliable, this small class of air search radar intended for use in destroyers was further improved by engineers. This radar is basically the eyes of the Destroyer Squadron.
洋上において艦隊を指揮する前線司令部です。\n司令部施設を開設できるある一定以上: This facility is used as a command center aboard warships to direct naval fleets at sea. This can only be used aboard larger warships. When used on the flagship of the "Combined Fleet", a "heavily damaged ship" can be escorted away from the battle line by a destroyer still in good shape from the escort fleet.
艦載機の整備の卓越した能力を発揮できる整備要員です。\n艦載機を装備した航空母艦: This maintenance crew can perform excellent maintenance on carrier-borne aircraft. Carrier planes serviced by this crew have better performance when launched from the carriers they were based from. Please try them out if you feel your main attack force is lacking the power punch!
零戦の最終的な量産型「零式艦上戦闘機52丙型」です。\n武装及び防御力が強化され: The Zero fighter's final production model is the "Type Zero Carrier-Based Fighter Model 52C". Weaponry and durability have been enhanced. However, mobility has been somewhat impaired. This is the same plane used by the reformed aircraft carrier mobile squadrons, responsible for controlling the skies.
「零戦」の後継機として開発された最新鋭艦上戦闘機「烈\n風」。\n用兵側の発動機: The "Reppuu" is a state-of-the-art, carrier-borne fighter designed to replace the "Zero" fighter. Despite difficulties in engine selection, preoccupied design teams, and factories, this new type of carrier-borne fighter was finally completed. This new fighter will form the backbone of carrier air groups of rebuilt carrier task groups.
「九九艦爆」の後継機として開発された高速艦爆「彗星」。\n液冷発動機装備のため運: The "Suisei" is a fast dive bomber developed to replace the "Type 99 Dive Bomber". Problems with its liquid-cooled engine and airframe have been smoothed out, and the 601 Air Group training inland transitioned into this aircraft. It will then be used by the 601 aboard carriers once the Carrier Task Force is starting to achieve its decisive battle.
旧式化した「九七艦攻」の後継機として開発された、新鋭艦上\n攻撃機「天山」。\n: The new "Tenzan" was developed as a successor to the obsolete "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber". This is the aircraft of choice of the elite 601st Air Group currently in training at the mainland. This aircraft is intended to form the backbone of strike groups of the newly formed Carrier Task Force.
艦攻と艦爆を統合した先進的な\"急降下爆撃可能な雷撃機\"、そ\nれが「流星」で: Ryusei is an advanced "dive bombing torpedo bomber" that integrates naval attack and naval bombing. Despite problems with its engine and weight, it was finally completed, boasting as a high-performance, cutting-edge, carrier-borne attack aircraft. The 601 Air Group in training transitioned into this type of aircraft. Well-maintained, this aircraft became the mainstay of the carrier attack group.
ビスマルク級戦艦に搭載された戦艦主砲の改修型です。\n短～中距離での砲撃戦を意識: An improved version of the main guns mounted on the Bismarck-class battleships. Meant as the main armament of fast battleships for short to medium ranged artillery combat, this upgrade has significantly improved its accuracy.
ビスマルク級などの主力艦艇に搭載された艦載水上偵察機で\nす。\n偵察、観測、哨: A reconnaissance aircraft installed in Bismarck-class flagships. This refurbished version was the widely dominant aircraft in the South Atlantic in reconnaissance, observation, patrol, and anti-submarine operations, playing the role of the eye of the fleet.
遠距離砲撃戦における秘密兵器「九一式徹甲弾」の改良版で\nす。\n海中突入後魚雷: The Type 1 Armor Piercing shell is an improved version of the secret "Type 91 Armor Piercing Shell" fired from long-range cannons. It is intended to work by plunging into the sea, striking the hull below the waterline of the enemy ship like a torpedo. It has better performance than the Type 91, and has colored dyes for identification and target assists. It can be equipped on battleships, aviation battleships, and fast battleships.
海軍工廠砲熕部が極秘開発した世界最大最強の戦艦主砲、その\n試作二連装砲です。\: The 46 cm twin gun mount is one of the main cannons developed in secrecy by the Naval Arsenal. While it can outrange enemy battleships with its 40 km maximum range, it is also lighter than the 46 cm triple cannons of the Yamato-class. It can be used as the main cannons on other frontline battleships.
制空権を失った空でも強行偵察が可能な高性能水偵を目指して\n開発された、十四試高: The "Shiun" was conceived as a high-performance seaplane intended to scout the enemy where air superiority is lost or unachievable. A next-generation seaplane powered by the Mitsubishi Kasei engine with a pair of contra-rotating propellers and floats that could be jettisoned for higher speed performance, tests were inconclusive with these features. Nonetheless, these aircraft saw service aboard the light cruiser, "Ooyodo".
巡洋艦等の主砲として開発された中距離砲の連装型です。\n練習巡洋艦「香取」や軽巡: This is the twin-mounted version of the medium-caliber guns developed for cruisers. It was equipped on the training cruiser "Katori" and the light cruiser "Yuubari". It is a weapon capable of anti-ship and anti-ground shelling.
高角砲の対空射撃用の高射装置です。\n高射機と高射射撃盤を組み合わせ、高角砲の有: This is the high-angle guns' director. The director and its firing dish together locate a target and find its best-fit firing angle. ...somewhat. This one is obsolete, and its primary function is already built-in on battleships, cruisers, etc.
比較的新しい高角砲対空射撃用の高射装置です。\n本高射機は測距儀がパッケージされ: This is the new high-angle anti-aircraft unit. The equipment includes a range-finder, providing high-angle anti-aircraft guns with more effective anti-air capability. Newer large-scale ships and the "Akizuki-class" anti-aircraft destroyers have the unit pre-installed.
「長10cm砲」といわれる10cm連装高角砲と「94式高射装\n置」の組み合わせ: A fleet air defense system created by combining the 10 cm twin high-angle gun "Long 10 cm" guns and the "Type 94 Anti-Air Fire Director". It was unable to be mass produced and the fire director was inferior to the state-of-the-art ones used by the great powers, but the combination of the Long 10 cm Gun and the fire director was still able to function as an air defense umbrella for the fleet.
かの国の重巡洋艦装備用に開発された連装砲です。\n高い命中率と火力を誇る優秀な巡: A twin-mounted gun developed for the heavy cruisers of that country. It is an excellent cruiser gun that boasts high accuracy and firepower. It displays its power during medium-ranged shelling.
かの国で開発された艦載用レーダー(電探)です。\n科学の国の電子兵装、残念ながら: This is a ship-borne radar developed in that country. Unfortunately, the radars of the land of science have higher specs than the ones equipped to our Combined Fleet. It is mainly used aboard cruisers or any other larger warships.
陳腐化した53cm魚雷の後継として開発された大型の61cm魚\n雷。\nその三連: The 61 cm torpedo was developed as a successor to the obsolete 53 cm torpedo. This 3-tubed torpedo launcher was equipped on the "Fubuki-class" Special-type destroyers. This improved version also exchanged its torpedoes for the "Type 93 Oxygen Torpedo".
かの国で開発された対地対艦攻撃用の艦載ロケットランチャー\n装備「WG42」です: The "WG42" is a ship-borne rocket launcher developed in that country for anti-ground attacks. It was also used aboard U-boats where it saw practical use. Mainly effective for anti-ground strikes, it suffered from poor accuracy, however, it can be fired from a shallow depth similar to the submarine-launched anti-ground missiles of today.
かの国で開発されていた、ジャイロ機構によって自動変針と直\n線航行を繰り返し行い: This is a prototype, submarine oxygen torpedo with the "FaT guidance system" which uses a gyroscopic mechanism to change course over time that was developed by that country for use on surface attacks on enemy warships. This prototype oxygen torpedo was brought by U-boats for practical use on sea-lane control.
改「大和」型、そしてその拡大発展級である超「大和」型の主\n兵装として開発されて: This is a large-caliber main gun for a new type of battleship that is being developed as the main weapon for the "Kai Yamato-class" and the expanded "Super Yamato-class". The 51 cm guns achieved firepower that overwhelmed the firepower of other battleship main guns. As the gun surpasses even the weight and size of the 46 cm guns, only a limited number of battleships can carry this gun.
水上戦闘艦に配備可能な熟練見張員です。\nその鍛え抜かれた肉眼視力による偵察力・: Skilled lookouts can be deployed on surface warships. Using their skilled naked eyes, they can largely contribute in scouting the enemy depending on the situation and before the advent of enemy radars, can spot for targets, especially during night battles.
巡洋艦以上の大型艦の標準的な対空兵装として搭載された\n12.7cm連装高角砲と: The 12.7 cm high angle gun with "Type 94 AA Fire Director" combination is the fleet's standard AA defense system used aboard cruisers or other larger warships. While its fire rate and traverse rate is a bit sluggish, this high-angle gun with a director serves as the umbrella of the fleet against air attacks.
増大する敵航空兵力の脅威に対抗するため、25mm高角機銃\nの三連装型を集中的に: In order to counter the threat of increased enemy air forces, concentrated deployment of multiple 25mm Triple Autocannon Mounts, this is a hedgehog-like anti-air machine gun weapon. Although there is an increase in accuracy, the 25 mm machine guns can end up overheating quickly, but it does increase an individual ship's air-defense capability by concentrating firepower.
大型艦用パッシブソナー兵装です。\n九三式水中聴音機の補音機を増強した大型グレー: A Passive SONAR system for large ships. An upgrade from the Type 93 Passive SONAR, with a larger sound collector, it was equipped on Yamato-class battleship within their bulbous bow. Specialized personnel constantly listening on the machine, trying to quickly recognize any enemy submarines.
パスタの国が生んだ三連装型の戦艦主砲です。\n高射速の50口径、中近距離戦闘での: A triple gun mount made for battleships by the land of pasta. A 50-caliber gun with a high rate of fire, being more powerful at medium-short ranges. In addition, the range is on par with the 46 cm cannons of the Yamato-class. There were issues with the cannon's durability. The spread of its fire was also wide, giving it poor accuracy.
パスタの国が生んだ、伝統と信頼の高性能中口径の三連装速射\n砲です。\n砲の旋回: Produced in the country of pasta, this is a reliable high-performance medium-caliber triple rapid-fire gun. This latest model uses electric power to rapidly swivel and elevate, and for the ammunition supply and loading. The newest fast battleships were equipped with it as a secondary cannon.
パスタの国が生んだ、新型高速戦艦向けに開発された最新鋭の\n高角砲です。\n単砲: From the land of the pasta, this state-of-the-art high-angled gun was developed for the new battleships. It may only have a single barrel, but with its fast firing rate, this gun was able to perform well because of its well-balanced mid-range anti-air defenses.
シリンダータイプの隔壁による、艦幅も重量も増やさずに水中\n防御を向上させる大型: The Pugliese Underwater Protection Bulkhead is a cylindrical bulkhead intended to increase underwater protection against large warships. As for the defense it provides, it should be considered as reliable when it was used in the Taranto battle training. (Can be mounted on battleships, battlecruisers, aviation battleships, and aircraft carriers (including armored carriers))
パスタの国が生んだ三連装型の戦艦主砲です。\n高射速の50口径、中近距離戦闘での: This triple-barreled cannon was one of the main cannons used in the land of the pastas by battleships. Boasting a fast-firing 50 caliber barrel, it was considered to have some of the highest firepower among mid-range combat equipment. As for firepower, it's very similar to the Yamato Class 46 cm cannons, and holds its rankings among them. Some of the main problems were its accuracy and durability, but with modernization, its accuracy has been improved over time.
四発の大型飛行艇「二式大型飛行艇」、通称「二式大艇」で\nす。\n巨大な翼と船の: This is the four-engined "Type 2 Large Seaplane", otherwise known as the "Type 2 Flying Boat". It has a large wing-like airframe, and was made for the usage of long-range reconnaissance as well as providing transportation for fleet command personnel. It was a state-of-the-art plane exceeding the world standard during its time, and to this day its successors are still active flying in the seas and skies.
阿賀野型軽巡シリーズの主兵装として開発された両用砲の改良\n改修型です。\n対巡: The improved and revised model of the dual-purpose gun developed as the main armament for the Agano-class light cruisers. It was a new design of light cruiser guns that emphasized combat with other cruisers but also possessed limited anti-air capabilities. This upgrade slightly improves its accuracy. It is a new model main gun that fits light cruisers.
戦艦装備用の大型探照灯です。\n夜戦時に敵に照射することで味方艦隊の攻撃を支援で: Large-scale searchlight fitted for battleships. Shining the searchlight at the enemy can assist friendly ship's attacks during the night battle, but there is risk of having the enemy focus their fire on the user. (Only battleships may equip this)
高性能な大型対水上電探の調整改良型です。\n遠距離射撃にも対応できるレーダー射撃: The Type 32 Kai is a modified, large, high-performance surface search radar. While it is capable of long-range search and gunfire control, it is very large and heavy, hence only large ships are able to equip them. For better use of this radar, it will require skilled and experienced crews.
大和型戦艦のために開発された射撃&電探兵装です。\n特注の大型光学15m二重測距: A radar that was made mainly for the Yamato-class. It uses its 15 m long optical to find the distance between yourself and the enemy, and includes an improved model of the type 21 anti-air radar. Owing to its size, this radar can only be equipped on battleships and needs to be mounted on the upper bridge of the ship.
優れた航続距離を誇り、初期の機動部隊艦載機の主力攻撃機と\nして大活躍した傑作艦: Boasting an excellent cruising range, the "Type 97 Torpedo Bomber" was a masterpiece carrier-capable attacker that played a major role as the primary attacker on board Mobile Force ships. The command squadron equipped with this plane was the elite attack squadron led by Captain Murata, who combined high skill with abundant leadership.
旧式化した「九七艦攻」の後継機として開発された、新鋭艦上\n攻撃機「天山」。同機: The "Tenzan" is an advanced torpedo bomber developed as a successor to the obsolete "Type 97 Attacker". The command squadron equipped with this plane is an elite attack squadron that has converted to the "Tenzan", led by a veteran commander with a history of high skill and abundant leadership.
腹が減ってはなんとやら……戦闘前にしっかりと腹ごしらえを\nしておきましょう。\: You can't fight on an empty whatever......Let's make sure to fill our stomachs before the battle. The flavor of rice balls eaten at sea is something special! (Is consumed on activation)
戦闘航海中の洋上で燃料弾薬を補給することが可能です。これ\nを保持した状態で燃料: It is possible to perform resupply on the seas to ships performing combat sailing. When fuel is low while this is being held, "Maritime Resupply" will happen, and fuel & ammo will be "replenished" on the seas. Please use this well as a support for the final battle, which could become a war of attrition. (Will disappear when activated.)
パスタの国が生んだ連装の小艦艇用主砲兵装です。\n口径は同クラスの日本海軍の主力: A twin-mounted gun produced in the country of pasta as the main armament of small ships. Although its caliber is smaller than that of IJN front-line destroyers, it is still a new model small caliber gun with good machinery and high potential.
水上機搭載可能な潜水艦による戦略的な運用を目指して開発さ\nれた、急降下爆撃可能: The high-spec ship-based attack plane "Seiran" was originally developed to be used by submarines capable of carrying seaplanes. This is the modified prototype version for use by carriers (with dive bombs) based off "Nanzan", with hooks attached for landing on ships. This is a test model, so bright coloring is applied.
小型艦艇にも装備可能な、新型パッシブソナー兵装です。\n九三式水中聴音機に比べて: This SONAR can be equipped on smaller ships, and is a new type of armament: a passive SONAR. Compared to the type 93 SONARs, this has increased ASW. There are few of these because it was made in the later part of the war, and were equipped by some of the newer destroyers.
旬の水揚げされたばかりの新鮮な秋刀魚を使った蒲焼の缶詰で\nす。脂が乗った秋刀魚: The seasonal "Kabayaki" Pacific Saury sealed in a can. Individually of course, and it tastes more delicious when eaten with Onigiri and so forth.
空技廠が開発した最新鋭の高々度試作偵察機「景雲」。同機に\n艦載用の改修を行った: The high-flight-level prototype reconnaissance plane "Keiun" developed by the Air Technical Arsenal. This is the remodeled version suitable for carriers. "Keiun" has a unique body, and there were planes to equip the "Ne-330" turbojet engine to transform it into an attacking plane. (This plane is only usable by a small portion of elite standard carriers).
熟練搭乗員で構成された「零式艦上戦闘機52型」装備の艦戦\n隊です。\n零戦の最: Carrier-based "Type 52 Zero Fighters" piloted by skilled pilots. "Type 52" was the last mass-produced model of the Zero fighters and due to the development delays of its successors, it continued to be the backbone of the carrier fighter force. The skills of the skilled pilots will cover for the technological inferiority.
巧みな操縦技術を持つ岩井小隊長を擁する「零式艦上戦闘機\n52型丙」装備の艦戦隊: A carrier-based squadron equipped with "Type 52 Model C Zero Fighters" commanded by the skilled squadron commander Iwai. The firepower and armor of the "Type 52C" were upgraded in order to counter new enemy planes. Although the maneuverability suffered slightly, it can be covered by the skilled piloting of the pilots.
遂に飛行隊を預かることになった「ゼロファイターゴッド」岩\n井隊長率いる、「零式: The last command of Lt. Iwai, the "Zero Fighter God", a bombing squadron equipped with "Type 62 Zero Fighter-bombers". Equipped with "Type 62s", the quick-response fighter-bomber squadron that can bomb enemy ships and participate in taking air superiority.
圧倒的な空戦技量を誇る岩本小隊長を擁する「零式艦上戦闘機\n21型」装備の艦戦隊: Commanded by squadron commander Iwamoto, the great dogfighting expert, a carrier-based squadron equipped with the "Type 21 Zero Fighter". The excellent combat ability and the long range of the zero fighters combined with the skills of the pilots result in overwhelming strength. Protecting the skies above "Zuikaku" during the Battle of the Coral Sea.
圧倒的な空戦技量を誇るエース、岩本小隊長を擁する「零式艦\n上戦闘機52型」装備: Commanded by squadron commander Iwamoto, the great dogfighting ace, a carrier-based squadron equipped with "Type 52 Zero Fighters". A late model of the Zero fighter piloted by an excellent pilot, the "Reisen Kotetsu", even if the plane is weaker than its enemies, it will still boldly challenge them and shoot them down without fail.
遂に飛行隊を預かることになった「零戦虎徹」岩本隊長率い\nる、「零式艦上戦闘機5: The last command of Lt. Iwamoto, the "Reisen Kotetsu", a carrier-based squadron equipped with "Type 53 Zero Fighters". Improvements to the engines and airframe of the "Type 52" resulted in the new model "Type 53", it soars into battle piloted by skilled pilots.
かの国で開発/量産された主力戦闘機Bf109シリーズ。\nメッサーシュミットの名: The Bf109 was the main fighter aircraft developed and mass-produced in another country. Also known as the Messerschmitt, it is a famous aircraft that was active in the skies of Europe. This aircraft is a further modification of the shipboard version based on the E type. It has great air defense capabilities.
かの国で開発/量産された強力で信頼性の高い戦闘機Fw190シ\nリーズ。タンク博: The Fw190 series of powerful and reliable fighter planes were developed and mass-produced in that other country. It was designed by Dr. Tank, and was known as the Focke-Wulf. This aircraft is a carrier-based version of a later model. It demonstrates a high level of air combat capability.
かの国で開発された艦艇防空用の連装高角砲です。大型艦艇な\nどに防空火器として装: A twin high-angle gun mount for vessel air defense developed in that country. It was equipped on large vessels as an air defense armament. Even on that aircraft carrier that repeatedly went between construction and work stoppage, it was planned to be equipped on the broadside and flight deck of the ship in superfiring arrangements.
Iowa級戦艦の主兵装として米国で開発された新型三連装主砲\nです。前級に搭載さ: This is a new model triple mount main cannon developed by the United States used as the main weapon for Iowa class battleships. As an improved main cannon to the one used by a previous class, the power is upgraded due to modifications such as the lengthening of the gun barrel. It is still in development but, it could also be fired by radar using a radar-linked gun fire control system.
パスタの国で生まれた中口径主砲です。昼間砲撃戦で優位を確\n保すべく誕生したザラ: A medium-caliber gun from the country of pasta. It was used as the main armament of the Zara-class heavy cruisers that were created to secure superiority in artillery combat during the day. Although it was capable of ranges comparable to battleships when firing at maximum elevation, it had problems with accuracy due to structural problems.
パスタの国で開発/運用された運動性に優れた複葉複座の水上\n偵察機です。同国の中: This is a biplane with good maneuverability and multiple seats used as recon seaplane by the country of pasta. It was equipped to ships of medium-sized and above. It has a lower speed, but as a recon seaplane with good reliability and maneuverability, it was still used as the eyes and liaison of the fleet. A single-seat fighter version also existed.
パスタの国で運用された信頼性と運動性に優れた複葉複座の水\n偵Ro.43を単座に: A single-seat seaplane fighter remodeled from the double-seat Ro.43 Recon Seaplane that came from the country of pasta. Because it was not as speedy, it had a limited capability as a fighter, but was counted on as a valuable maritime anti-air force. It was not mass produced as much.
新型水上戦闘機の実戦投入までの繋ぎとして、零式艦上戦闘機\nをベースに急遽開発/: A new model of seaplane fighter thrown into combat in order add numbers to the fight, the base form of the Type 0 Zero Carrier Fighter has been hurriedly converted to a seaplane and put in service. No extra equipment was added to the plane, instead, the airframe and float devices have been strengthened to handle catapult-assisted take-off.
大発動艇、略して「大発」。旧式ではありますが量産型「大\n発」に積載可能な「八九: The Daihatsu-class landing craft, or "Daihatsu" for short. Even though they are outdated, the old model "Daihatsu" can still carry the "Type 89 Medium Tank" and a heavy weapons squad, with the amphibious assault version (armed with a prototype gun) used for landing operations. Not only used for transport missions, it can also be used for landing operations too.
島嶼への上陸作戦のために開発された水陸両用「特二式内火\n艇」、通称「カミ車」で: An amphibious vehicle developed for landing operations around islands, the "Special Type 2 Amphibious Tank", also known as the "Ka-Mi Tank". Equipped with removable floats at the front and back, it allowed landing operations to have armored support. With watertight construction, it can also be deployed aboard submarines.
陸上航空基地に展開、対艦攻撃などを主任務とした陸上攻撃機\nです。大きな航続距離: Deployed at the Navy's land-based airfields, its primary mission was anti-ship bombardment. With its long range, although it was naturally designed for anti-ship missions, it was used against land-based installations as well, it was also nicknamed the Rikko, and it formed the core of the Navy's early air power. The successor to this design was the more famous "Type 1 Land Attacker".
陸上航空基地より発進、敵艦船への対艦攻撃及び敵飛行場等へ\nの対地攻撃などを行っ: Launching from land-based airfields, it was deployed in anti-naval roles against enemy vessels as well as for bombardment of enemy airfields as the Navy's main land-based bomber. Although late in the war the loss of air superiority led to heavy losses, the "Type 1 Land Attacker" indisputably fought bravely as the core of the Naval Aviation's attacking forces to the end.
歴戦の中攻乗りの空中指揮官、野中飛行長の率いる精鋭「一式\n陸攻」隊です。\n新: This is the "Type 1 Land Attacker" squadron led by a commander in the air, Nonaka. Equipped with the newest "Type 1 Land Attacker", the pilots of the "Nonaka branch" will run anti-ship/anti-structure missions with high morale.
Vought社が開発した艦載観測機です。水上機タイプの本機\nは、米海軍の水上艦: This is an observation plane developed by Vought. This seaplane was equipped by USN surface ships, and utilized by battleships and cruisers beginning with the Iowa-class for enemy detection.
米国で開発・運用された優秀な小口径両用砲の改良型です。\n本装備は連装タイプの両: This is the improved version of a great-performing small-caliber dual-purpose gun developed and utilized by the USA. This is a twin-gun dual-purpose gun, and it was utilized by capital ships as anti-air armament. This is a new type of dual-purpose gun with a good balance of performance.
北欧生まれの世界的ベストセラーの40mm対空機関砲、その\n艦載四連装バージョン: The shipborne, quadruple-mounted version of the Nordic-created worldwide bestselling 40 mm anti-air autocannon. The base version of the gun was considered a masterpiece and as such was adopted by many countries including the enemy forces. Proving to be excellent at short-range surface-to-air fire, it was equipped on many US and British Navy vessels as well.
旧式の53cm魚雷の連装発射管です。新型の61cm酸素魚雷と\n比較すると、射程: This is the firing tube of the older 53 cm Torpedo. When compared with the newer 61 cm oxygen torpedo, the range and power are outclassed, but it is serviceable in close-range torpedo combat. This was equipped by the slightly older-class destroyers such as the "Kamikaze-class".
「十四試局地戦闘機」として開発された、対爆撃機要撃に特化\nした迎撃戦闘機「雷電: Developed under the specification for the “Showa 14 Land-based Fighter” the “Raiden” was an interceptor that specialized in combating bombers. While the carrier-based Zero Fighter represented "Plan A" for offensive operations, as a local interceptor the Raiden was developed and operated under "Plan B" for defense. With poor maneuverability, it was not suited for dogfights, however, it had excellent climbing performance and armament.
かの国で開発された液冷エンジンを参考に開発された、液冷エ\nンジンを装備した陸軍: The “Hien” or Army Type 3 Fighter, was equipped with a liquid-cooled engine developed using the liquid-cooled engine from that country as a reference. Although under test conditions it was very promising, unfortunately, its lack of reliability prevented it from ever achieving the high potential of its abilities in action.
三式戦「飛燕」を駆り、東京調布に展開して首都防空に奮戦し\nた陸軍戦闘機隊、飛行: These Type 3 Fighter “Hien” are piloted by the 244th Air Combat Group, part of the Army’s fighter forces who bravely took part in the defenses of the capital city while deployed Chofu, Tokyo. For the final stage of the war, these “Hien’s” have had their engines upgraded to a much more reliable liquid-cooled variant used by the “Type 5 Fighter”.
「カタリナ」の愛称で親しまれた傑作飛行艇です。\n信頼性の高い水陸両用機で、哨戒: Nicknamed “Catalina”, this was a wonderfully designed flying boat. It was widely used for patrol and rescue operations. Even after the end of the war, this masterpiece of a machine saw continued usage.
大威力長射程を誇る、秘密兵器「九三式酸素魚雷」。\nその必殺の酸素魚雷を最大限に: The secret weapon "Type 93 Oxygen Torpedo" known for its power and long range. This is the prototype sextuple [Oxygen Torpedoes] firing tubes created by loading the oxygen torpedoes as much as possible, and one of these has more torpedo firepower than an older-class destroyer would have. There were plans to equip the new later-model destroyers with these.
陸上航空基地より発進、敵艦船への対艦攻撃及び敵飛行場等へ\nの対地攻撃などを行っ: This is the improved-capability model of the Navy's main land-based attack aircraft the "Type 1 Land-based Attacker", which deployed from land air bases and carried out anti-ship attacks on enemy ships, anti-ground attacks on enemy airfields, and such. Portions of the airframe were redesigned, as well as the addition of a rotating machine gun on the top of the airframe and the enhancement of the lateral machine guns, and even though its capabilities were limited, a plane-mounted radar was also installed.
名機零式艦戦21型の性能向上型、「零式艦上戦闘機32型」で\nす。\n翼端を角型: An improvement over the high-performance Model 21 Zero, the "Type 0 Fighter Carrier-Based Model 32". The wing tips were squared off and the engine retrofitted to improve performance. In addition to that, the ammunition capacity of the machine guns was increased. It was at a disadvantage when it came to operation range but it still served in the Rabaul and Buin Air Corps as well as in the skies of Solomon.
熟練搭乗員で構成された「零式艦上戦闘機32型」装備の艦戦\n隊です。\n翼端を切: A carrier-based squadron made up of skilled crew equipped with the "Type 0 Fighter Model 32". The "Model 32" was an improvement over the Model 21, it had its wingtips squared off and although it had issues with range, it was piloted by skilled elites in Rabaul and in the fierce battles in the skies above Solomon.
Iowa級戦艦の主兵装として米国で開発された強力な新型三連\n装主砲と、その改良: A powerful triple cannon developed by the US as the main gun of the Iowa-class battleships that have been paired with an improved fire control system. An ancestor of modern FCS, it pairs a fire control radar with a computer to achieve devastating firepower with precision and accuracy.
パスタの国で開発/配備された液冷エンジン装備の戦闘機の艦\n載型です。\n同国の: A carrier-based version of a fighter plane with a liquid cooling engine that was being developed in the land of pasta. It was planned to be utilized by aircraft carriers being built by the same country.
かの国で開発された液冷エンジンを参考に開発された、液冷エ\nンジンを装備した陸軍: An improved model of the Army Type 3 Fighter "Hien", equipped with a liquid-cooled engine developed using a reference engine from that country. The engine reliability problems have been sorted out and the armament improved to increase overall combat power. If properly maintained, it will display a high level of combat prowess.
陸上航空基地より発進、敵艦船への対艦攻撃及び敵飛行場等へ\nの対地攻撃などを行っ: An improved version of the Navy's premier ground attack plane "Type 1 Land Attacker"; launched from land-based air bases for anti-ship operations against enemy vessels and air-raids against enemy airfields. This is a late remodel of the Type 1 Land Attacker that has undergone changes to the shape of the tail and a redesign to fix the vulnerability of the fuel tank.
海軍の主力陸上攻撃機「一式陸攻」の後継機として開発された\n陸上発進の攻撃機です: Developed as a successor to the "Type 1 Land Attacker", the premier land-attack plane of the Navy. The excellent design of the airframe hides an impressive performance. It arrived too late to change the course of the war and the problems caused by its complex construction were not solved; it saw combat at the end of the war. Some were converted to night fighters.
パスタの国で開発/配備された液冷エンジン装備の戦闘機の\n……航空魚雷装備型です: Torpedo fighters equipped with liquid-cooled engines that were developed and deployed by the country of pasta. It was supposed... to be capable of dropping torpedoes and contesting air superiority. A hybrid airframe used for anti-ship operations.
パスタの国で戦いの後期に開発が進められていた高性能戦闘機\nです。\n量産戦力化: A high-performance fighter from the later stages of the war that was developed in the land of pasta. It wasn't managed to be mass-produced, but it had a lot of hidden potential and high expectations of its combat potential. This plane is the carrier-based version.
紅茶の国の戦艦主兵装用に開発された連装大口径主砲です。\n同国ならでは堅実な作り: A large caliber main battery developed for the country of tea's main battleships. A reliable main gun made in that country, it was later linked with a radar and fire control system.
紅茶の国の大型艦などに搭載された対空火器で、その個性ある\n射撃音から通称ポンポ: An anti-aircraft gun mounted on large ships from the country of tea, commonly known as a pom-pom gun due to its unique sound. This gun is the octuple version. It is hard to use and prone to breaking down; a famous anti-air point defense with high firepower.
紅茶の国で戦艦主兵装用に開発された連装大口径主砲です。\n堅実な作りの傑作砲に対: A large caliber twin-mounted gun developed in the country of tea for use on battleships. A reliable master-crafted gun with an angle of elevation increased from modernization improvements. An improved version of the tried and tested battleship gun.
特大発動艇、略して「特大発」。\n輸送船からの揚陸作業や上陸戦に用いる数多く量産: Toku Daihatsu-class Landing Craft or "Toku Daihatsu" for short. Unloading and landing operations made use of great numbers of these mass-produced "Daihatsu" landing craft. The maritime truck "Daihatsu" was increased in size to accommodate the new medium tank.
トリコロールの国で開発された水上攻撃機です。\n日本海軍ではあまり研究されなかっ: This is a seaplane attacker developed in the tricolor country. It was also designed to carry a torpedo, something the Japanese navy did not study much. This variant has folding wings for use on seaplane tenders, and was expected to perform multiple roles including recon and fighter-bomber.
シンプルかつ頑丈な作りの傑作急降下爆撃機です。\n大戦初期の機体でありながら、旧: Called the Dauntless, this simple yet robust dive bomber was used extensively during the war. In the hands of a skilled pilot it can even be used as a fighter.
九七艦攻のライバルともいえる艦上攻撃機です。\n速度が遅く、大戦初期の機体で激戦: This carrier-capable torpedo bomber can be considered a rival to the Type 97. It was slow and obsolete even during the fierce early days of the war, but its desperate attack contributed to a great victory.
大戦初期の太平洋上で零戦としのぎを削った名艦上戦闘機、そ\nの初期部隊配備型です: The F4F is a famous shipboard fighter that competed with the Zero in the Pacific during the early stage of the war. Known as the Wildcat, the F4F series fought valiantly against the Zero squadrons despite being inferior.
大戦初期の太平洋上で零戦としのぎを削った名艦上戦闘機、そ\nの改良型です。\nワ: An improved version of the famous shipboard fighter that competed with the Zero in the Pacific at the beginning of the war. Known as the Wildcat, the F4F series fought valiantly against the Zero squadrons despite being inferior. This aircraft is a final version of the F4F with enhanced firepower and optimizations for carrier operations.

初期の実用艦載電探、その改良型です。\n対空用ですが、対水上電探としても使用可能: An improved version of an early ship-borne radar. Although it was designed for anti-air, it can also be used as a surface radar. The more reliable late-model torpedoes were an overwhelming menace against Japanese convoys and escort vessels. It severely limited the ability of the Imperial Japanese Navy and Japan to prosecute the war.
潜水艦の後部に設置する、魚雷兵装です。\n4門の発射管を備え、艦首発射管とあわせ: A torpedo weapon installed in a submarine's stern. With 4 tubes, it allows the capability to launch a large spread when combined with the bow tubes. The more reliable late-models have even greater combat capability.
潜水艦の後部に設置する魚雷兵装、その後期型です。\n4門の発射管を備え、前部の発: This is a late-model torpedo weapon installed in a submarine's stern. The 4 tubes are capable of executing a larger torpedo spread when combined with the bow tubes. The more reliable late-model torpedoes can exhibit a significant increase in torpedo power when combined with bow tubes.
陸軍で開発された新鋭双発爆撃機キ67四式重爆撃機「飛龍」\nです。軽快な運動性を: This is the latest twin-engine bomber developed by the Army, the Ki-67 Type 4 Heavy Bomber "Hiryuu". Boasting high maneuverability, this aircraft can mount torpedoes on external hardpoints. This particular plane is a guided-missile carrier equipped with the prototype No.1 Model 1A Radio-Guided Missile, the predecessor of modern air-to-surface anti-ship missiles. This guided missile was the objective of Army aviation engineers. The plan was to mass-produce it and arm the new Ki-102B bombers with it.
日本陸軍が開発、配備した二式複座戦闘機、通称二式複戦、\n「屠龍」です。\n双発: This is the Type 2 two-seater fighter developed and deployed by the Imperial Japanese Army, the "Toryuu". With two seats and two engines, it can be more heavily armed. Its mobility is inferior to single-seat fighters so it is unsuited for dogfighting. It flew sorties to intercept B-29 bombers over the Japanese mainland late in the war. Despite being outnumbered, it fought hard to defend Japanese skies in the air war.
日本陸軍が開発、配備した二式複座戦闘機、通称二式複戦、\n「屠龍」。その改良型重: The "Toryuu" Type 2 Two-seat Fighter developed and deployed by the Imperial Japanese Army. This is an improved and up-gunned version. The Model C upgrade featured additional high-caliber guns meant for intercepting heavy bombers. This anti-heavy bomber Toryuu was experimentally equipped with these "oblique guns". Though it is unsuited for dogfighting, it fought hard alongside the Navy's "Gekkou" to defend the Japanese mainland against heavy bombers.
零式艦上戦闘機の後期強化型64型。同機をさらにif改装し、小\n型軽量化したKM: A late-model upgrade of the Type 0 Model 64 shipborne fighter. This unit is a what-if upgrade is equipped with a lightweight KMX and anti-submarine equipment. The two-seat cockpit on this anti-submarine fighter/bomber has space for a reconnaissance/navigation officer. It was deployed with the 931 Squadron who operated from land bases and escort carriers to defend the Southern corridor. Along with desperately trying to secure air superiority, it patrolled the seas alongside the Toukai to suppress enemy submarines and escort convoys.
九七式中戦車の車体をベースに九〇式野砲を搭載した自走砲、\n通称一式砲戦車。\n: A self-propelled gun consisting of a Type 90 field gun mated to a Type 97 medium tank chassis, aka the Type 1 Gun tank. This is an armored unit with limited anti-tank capabilities. This unit consists of a Type 1 Gun tank, an anti-tank self-propelled gun that fought against overwhelming odds. It is accompanied by an armed-to-the-teeth infantry unit, all loaded on a Toku Daihatsu landing craft. It is very effective in landing operations.
艦載用対空電探の戦訓を活かした改良後期型です。\n比較的信頼性も高く、小型軽量で: This is a late-model shipborne anti-air RADAR improved with lessons learned from combat. The "Type 13 Air RADAR" was relatively reliable. Compact and lightweight, it was equipped on destroyers and the like. Incorporating lessons learned by the frontline destroyers, this small RADAR is a what-if version with upgrades done by engineers on site. It will prove its worth as the eyes of torpedo squadrons.
陸軍で開発、対潜哨戒機としても運用されていた小型固定翼\n機、兵装及び磁気探知機: A small fixed-wing aircraft developed by the IJA as a maritime patrol aircraft. This is a what-if version with improved weapons and magnetic anomaly detectors. Its performance is similar to modern STOL (Short Take Off and Landing) aircraft. The plan was to operate it as a carrier-based maritime patrol aircraft. It can be operated off amphibious assault ships with through-decks or off special escort carriers like Yamashio Maru.
日本陸軍が二式複戦「屠龍」をベースに開発した試作双発戦闘\n機です。対戦闘機戦闘: A prototype twin-engine fighter developed using the Imperial Japanese Army's Type 2 two-seat fighter "Toryuu" as a base. The performance of the officially adopted Toryuu (Ki-45 Kai) was further improved with the removal of the rear seat, better engines, and more firepower. This plane was pressed into desperate anti-air combat. Unfortunately, it wasn't adopted by the military but showed great potential against the B-29 and its successors.
日本陸軍が二式複戦「屠龍」をベースに開発した試作新型双発\n戦闘機キ96。制式採: The Ki-96 prototype twin-engine fighter was developed using the Imperial Japanese Army's Type 2 two-seat fighter "Toryuu" as a base. A continuation of the development of that fighter that wasn't officially adopted resulted in this prominent high-speed assault aircraft, the perfected Ki-102 B. Equipped with a 57 mm autocannon alongside several other autocannons, its high speed and adequate bombing power meant it was kept in reserve to fight the decisive battle where its mobility and firepower were expected to do the hard fighting.
日本陸軍が二式複戦「屠龍」をベースに開発した試作新型双発\n戦闘機キ96をさらに: The Ki-96 prototype twin-engine fighter was developed using the Imperial Japanese Army's Type 2 two-seat fighter "Toryuu" as a base. This upgraded aircraft has high mobility, powerful armaments, and can carry a sufficient payload. It has been designed by Army engineers to evade heavy attacks. It is a new model of high-speed land attack aircraft equipped with the prototype No.1 Model 1A Radio-Guided Missile, the predecessor of domestic air-to-surface anti-ship missiles.
大戦時は旧式化したものの、特I型駆逐艦に採用された近代的\n駆逐艦用主砲の先駆け: Though obsolete at the outset of World War 2, the Type-A gun mounted on the Special Type I destroyers was the forerunner of modern destroyer guns. Using the Type-A as a base, this is a what-if upgrade that extends the barrel length and increases muzzle velocity. It is among the destroyer main guns with the highest firepower thanks to several upgrades that focus on increasing surface combat ability. Though the basic design has limitations, it is capable of limited anti-air combat. This is the predecessor to the next generation of 12.7 cm guns.
米国で開発され、多くの水上艦艇に装備された実用的な対水上\nレーダー、その後期型: A late-war model of the practical surface RADAR developed by the US and mounted on various surface combatants. Originally based on RADAR technology obtained from the UK, its surface and low-altitude air search capabilities have been improved. A practical and stable RADAR that became the standard issue RADAR on all the USN's ships.
伊号潜水艦の艦首に装備する、潜水艦専用魚雷兵装の改良後期\n型です。\n水上艦艇: An upgraded late-model version of the submarine torpedoes mounted on the bows of 1st class submarines. Though it has a smaller diameter compared to torpedoes mounted on surface combatants, these four late-model bow-mounted torpedoes in bubble-suppressing launch tubes are still deadly with their long range and high firepower. It was mounted on high-speed 1st class attack submarines that make up for its smaller number of tubes by firing from more advantageous positions.
潜高型などの次世代型邀撃用高速潜水艦に装備する、国産潜水\n艦装備です。艦橋上部: A domestic submarine equipment that was meant to be mounted on the next-generation high-speed attack submarines. With a large number of waterproof periscopes mounted atop the bridge, along with surface and air RADAR, it is a practical equipment that allows quick identification of threats and targets. Along with imported snorkel technology, it was expected that it would increase the survivability and offensive capability of the new class of submarines.
米国で開発され、米陸軍航空隊及び海軍で運用された陸上発進\nの双発爆撃機です。\: A land-based twin-engined bomber developed by the US and operated by both the USN and US Army Air Corps. Easy to operate, sturdy, and with a large bomb-carrying capacity, it was introduced to theatres all over Europe and the Pacific. It could effectively engage surface ships using the dreaded skip bombing technique that skips bombs across the water like a stone.
大和型戦艦のために開発された射撃&電探兵装です。\n特注の大型光学15m二重測距: A fire-control and surface search equipment developed for the Yamato-class battleships. A customized equipment consisting of an upgraded 15m coincidence rangefinder coupled with an accurate Type 21 air RADAR tuned by excellent engineers. Due to its size and weight, it can only be equipped on the bridges of battleships. With a crew of skilled operators and its upgraded optics and RADAR, it can enable precision shelling.
伊号潜水艦の艦首に装備する、潜水艦専用魚雷兵装の改良後期\n型です。水上艦艇に搭: An upgraded late-model version of the submarine torpedoes mounted on the bows of 1st class submarines. Though it has a smaller diameter compared to torpedoes mounted on surface combatants, these four late-model bow-mounted torpedoes in bubble-suppressing launch tubes are still deadly with their long range and high firepower. This equipment is mounted on the high-speed 1st class attack submarines. Though it has a smaller number of launch tubes, an upgraded bubble-suppressing launcher, and skilled sonar personnel give the 1st class submarine increased survivability and offensive capability.
巡洋艦主砲兵装を「大和」型戦艦副砲に搭載した、対空戦闘も\n可能な、性能・運用性: This gun was mounted on cruisers as a main gun and on the "Yamato-class" battleships as a secondary gun. This high-performance and easy-to-use gun is capable of anti-air combat and is an excellent battleship secondary gun. There are lots of opinions on its defensive capabilities, some identifying it as the sole weak point of the "Yamato-class". This version has had the armor on the upper face of the turret reinforced. Further improvements have been made to the fire rate, firing angle, and layout of the inner spaces to better resist incoming fire. This secondary gun has been optimized for use with Yamato Kai Ni.
画期的な長砲身半自動装填砲を動力砲塔に備えた「長10cm」\nと呼ばれた新型の防: The "Long 10 cm" is a revolutionary long-barrelled autoloading gun in a powered turret. It is a new model of twin high-angle gun meant as an anti-air high-angle gun that was mounted on the "Akizuki-class" destroyers. Due to its complexity, it wasn't able to be mass-produced. Despite that, it still formed a key component of the fleet's air defenses against enemy air dominance. These high-angle guns were expected to be mounted on the upgraded "Yamato-class" in a concentrated emplacement and paired with an anti-air fire director to protect the ship and the fleet!
改「大和」型、そしてその拡大発展級である超「大和」型の主\n兵装として開発された: A what-if planned new-model large caliber battleship main gun developed for the "Kai Yamato-class" and her enlarged version, the "Super Yamato-class". The overwhelming firepower of the 51cm triple gun mount was achieved with major changes to the internal layout and optimizations to the armor layout. Only heavily upgraded large battleships can make the best use of these guns.
艦攻と艦爆を統合した先進的な”急降下爆撃可能な雷撃機”\n「流星」の性能向上型で: This is a version of the "dive-bombing capable torpedo bomber" "Ryuusei", that was able to function as a torpedo bomber and dive bomber, with improved performance. The "Ryuusei Kai", considered one of the world's best carrier-based torpedo bombers, not only had a beautiful form but also hydraulically operated bomb bay doors, landing gear, and foldable wings. It played an active role in land-based air forces during the closing days of the war. This unit is a powerful carrier-based Ryuusei Kai piloted by skilled pairs.
米国で開発された優秀な5inch両用砲のベストセラー。本砲を\n片舷に副砲として: A wildly popular excellent 5 inch dual-purpose gun developed by the US. This weapon consists of four turrets of secondary guns with eight barrels total mounted on one side of the ship. Equipped on large surface combat ships like heavy cruisers and larger, it not only serves as an anti-aircraft weapon, but also increases the overall combat power of the ship. ※It has increased capabilities when equipped on USN battleships.
トリコロールの国で開発された戦艦主砲の改良型です。\n「Richelieu」級戦: An improved version of the battleship main gun developed by the tricolore country. This is a further upgrade of the powerful large caliber 38 cm quadruple gun mount that was equipped on the "Richelieu-class" battleships, with this what-if upgrade of the large-caliber quadruple mount optimized for use on the Richelieu-class.
艦隊の航空偵察の主役として、戦いの前半期では幅広い局面で\n活躍した「零式水上偵: The "Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane" was the leading reconnaissance seaplane of the fleet and was widely used during the first half of the war. It was equipped on every ship in the fleet. The crew of three would undertake reconnaissance missions and act as the "eyes" of the fleet. This unit is a new three-seater night reconnaissance seaplane that has been upgraded for night operations with the addition of a surface RADAR.
艦隊型日本駆逐艦に搭載された主砲のif改修型です。本来D型\n砲への繋ぎ的存在だ: A what-if upgraded version of the main gun mounted on Japanese fleet destroyers. The Model C was meant as a stop-gap model preceding the Model D. This gun has been given an upgrade incorporating several lessons learned in combat. It is unsuitable for anti-air use. It is optimized for use on the Shiratsuyu-class, Asashio-class, and Kagerou-class. It is extra effective on remodeled versions of Kagerou-class ships and the last or the Shiratsuyu-class. This what-if Japanese destroyer equipment can also be used alongside surface RADAR.
トリコロールの国で開発された三座飛行艇です。\nやや大型、そして低速で最新の機体: A three-seater flying boat developed in the tricolore country. Though rather large, slow, and not cutting edge, it is sturdily built, with the M Model modified for shipboard use was deployed and operated from the "Richelieu-class" and other mainline combat ships. Please equip it on French ships!
米国で開発、配備された誘導式対潜魚雷です。\nあの大戦末期に開発された、アクティ: A guided anti-submarine torpedo developed and deployed by the US. This next-generation anti-submarine torpedo with active acoustic homing capabilities was developed at the end of the war. It was contained in a Mk.2 thrower and mounted on surface vessels. The technology used in this would be used in later anti-submarine equipment for the USN and JMSDF.
高性能艦上戦闘機として開発が進められたF4U、航空母艦での\n運用が難しいと思わ: The F4U was developed as a high-performance carrier-based fighter, but the early models which experienced difficulties with carrier operations, was operated from land instead. After some upgrades, they were deployed to carrier task forces. This unit is a "Night Corsair" equipped with a radar pod for night operations. A small number were deployed late in World War II for night interceptions and operations.

The F4U was developed as a high-performance carrier-based fighter, but the early models which experienced difficulties with carrier operations, was operated from land instead. Each of the upgraded and improved fighter/bomber versions continued to be operated from carriers even after the war. Its success as a multi-role aircraft is well demonstrated and it served well as a fighter/bomber. This unit is a late model with a powerful engine and four propellers.
高性能艦上戦闘機として開発が進められたF4U、戦闘爆撃機と\nして優れた発展性を: The F4U was developed as a high-performance carrier-based fighter. Since it showed great potential as a fighter/bomber, improvements and upgrades have produced several variants. These variants have continued to be operated from carriers even after World War II, a multi-role fighter/bomber with a long and distinguished service. Though the F4U is a small single-seat fighter/bomber, this unit is the heavy fighter/bomber variant capable of carrying more bombs than an ordinary heavy bomber.

The F4U was developed as a high-performance carrier-based fighter. Since it showed great potential as a fighter/bomber, improvements and upgrades have produced several variants. These variants have continued to be operated from carriers even after World War II, a multi-role fighter/bomber with a long and distinguished service. This unit was re-designed for the French Navy after the war. This late model can be said to be the final F4U variant ever operated by the French Navy.
機動部隊の艦載機運用を現場の最前線で支える甲板要員たち。\n各空母の飛行甲板で搭: They are deck personnels that support the carrier task force's carrier operations on the front lines. On the flight deck of each carrier, these professionals support carrier operations in a range of areas such as refueling, take-off, landing, and maintenance. ※They can be used to make the "Skilled Deck Personnel + Aviation Maintenance Hands" even better.
機動部隊の艦載機運用を現場の最前線で支える甲板要員たちと\n格納庫の中などで艦載: They are deck personnel that support the carrier task force's carrier operations on the front lines and the unsung heroes who maintain and tune the aircraft and equipment in the hangars. The strength of a carrier task force can be increased by their skills and teamwork. ※Each upgrade will increase their competency. ※Can be equipped in a reinforcement expansion.
紅茶の国で開発され、主に同空軍で運用された傑作双発戦闘爆\n撃機です。多くのパー: A masterpiece high-speed twin-engined fighter-bomber developed by the country of tea and primarily operated by their air force. It is a unique aircraft with many components made from wood, making it difficult to detect on radar. It can be considered a stealth aircraft not quite like what we have in modern times. This high-speed, high-performance wooden wonder has several variations and is still renowned today.
紅茶の国で開発、運用された傑作高速双発機です。\n多くのパーツに木材を使用したユ: A masterpiece high-speed twin-engined aircraft developed and deployed by the country of tea. It is a unique aircraft with many components made from wood, making it difficult to detect on radar. It can be considered a stealth aircraft not quite like what we have in modern times. This aircraft has several variations developed. This unit is the reconnaissance version equipped with a reconnaissance camera. The high-speed, high-performance wooden wonder is still renowned today.

A masterpiece high-speed twin-engined aircraft developed and deployed by the country of tea. It is a unique aircraft with many components made from wood, making it difficult to detect on radar. It can be considered a stealth aircraft not quite like what we have in modern times. This aircraft has several variants developed. This unit is the carrier-based radar-equipped torpedo bomber variant of the wooden wonder that is still renowned today.
精鋭陸戦兵装を装備した陸戦隊とⅢ号戦車G型を搭載した、特\n別編成部隊と特大発動: A what-if specialized assault force consisting of elite troops accompanied by a Panzer III Ausf. G embarked on a toku daihatsu. The toku daihatsu has a special paint job and modifications to suit the North African theatre. Capable of limited anti-armor combat, it will display its full power in landing operations on the North African front.
戦艦などの大型艦の主砲から放たれる対空用特殊砲弾。\n榴散弾の一種で、大量の子弾: A specialized anti-aircraft shell used with the main guns of battleships and other large vessels. This shell is a late-model upgraded variant of the Type 3 Incendiary Cluster Shell, a type of shrapnel shell that was developed to annihilate the enemy in a single salvo of exploding submunitions. Its effectiveness against soft-skinned ground targets has been improved. This what-if upgrade that incorporates lessons learned during the war has increased effectiveness on Yamato-class and Kongou-class Kai Ni. It also has better countermeasures against spontaneous combustion.
陸軍で開発された新鋭双発爆撃機キ67四式重爆撃機「飛龍」\nです。軽快な運動性を: The Ki-67 Type 4 Heavy Bomber is a state-of-the-art twin-engined bomber developed by the IJA, aka "Hiryuu". It is maneuverable despite having externally mounted torpedoes. This guided-missile bomber is also equipped with the No.1 Model 1A guided missile, the ancestor of modern air-to-ship missiles. This anti-ship ship missile was the goal of IJA aviation engineers. This unit is an elite land-based unit with said missiles and crewed by a skilled crew.
水上機の名門が開発した空戦に特化した水上機「強風」。難航\nする同機開発の繋ぎと: This is a seaplane specialized in aerial fighting, developed by a famous seaplane company, the "Kyoufuu". It was expected to become the successor to the Type 2 seaplane fighter, and was introduced as a bridge to overcome the development difficulties of a new fighter. Although the initial mass-produced version was limited, the redesigned "Shiden Kai", whose development is based on the "Shiden", fought hard and served as a trump card for mainland air defense. This version is another what-if seaplane with enhanced airframe strength, and armament.
名機零戦の最終モデルの一つ。数機のみ実際に完成した幻の機\n体です。次々に登場す: One of the last models of the famous Type Zero Fighter. Only a few of these fabled fighters were ever completed. In order to contest the new high-performance allied aircraft that entered the theatre, it is equipped with a high-output Kinsei engine. This model deemphasizes dogfighting in favor of hit-and-run tactics. It will continue to demonstrate its strength as an air superiority fighter as its upgrades improve.
数機のみ実際に完成し、終戦時に残存した名機零戦の幻の最終\n型、本機は熟練搭乗員: Only a few of the last models of the fabled Type Zero fighter were produced and survived till the end of the war. This fighter-bomber variant is piloted by an experienced crew. In order to contest the new high-performance Allied aircraft that entered the theatre, it is equipped with a high-output Kinsei engine and a strengthened airframe. Equipped with 250 kg bombs and machine guns and rocket rails on both wings, it is an assault-focused fighter bomber that deemphasizes dogfighting to focus on striking a single blow.
対潜水艦に使用する増加爆雷装備です。装填爆薬の改良、爆発\n深度調整幅の拡大、誘: A supplementary depth charge for anti-submarine use. Using lessons learned in combat, these depth charges have been upgraded with a larger explosive charge, wider operational depth, and resistance to secondary explosions. You can improve the anti-submarine strength of destroyers and coastal defense ships by equipping this along with depth charge projectors and sonars. It has even greater capabilities on certain remodeled destroyers.
最も量産された陸軍主力戦闘機、一式戦「隼」、その改良二型\nです。\n機体の基本: The mass-produced Type 1 Fighter "Hayabusa" was the main fighter of the IJA. This is the upgraded Model II variant. Though its basic design was becoming obsolete, the mature design was given a maritime camouflage and anti-submarine bombs. This what-if variant is an upgraded anti-submarine patrol aircraft designed for operating off certain IJA carriers. ※This aircraft can be deployed on land bases.
急降下爆撃も可能な高性能傑作多用途水上偵察機「瑞雲」。\n航空戦艦「伊勢」「日向: The "Zuiun" is a high-performance masterpiece seaplane reconnaissance bomber. The highly trained 634th Zuiun Squadron was formed to be deployed on the aviation battleships "Ise" and "Hyuuga". This Type 12 Kai Ni model has been upgraded further for night operations. Equipped with a RADAR, flares, and a veteran crew, this what-if night operations model has the power to improve the nighttime capabilities of aviation cruisers and other surface vessels.
最も量産された陸軍主力戦闘機、一式戦「隼」、その改良三型\nをさらに船載運用if: The mass-produced Type 1 Fighter "Hayabusa" was the main fighter of the IJA. This upgraded what-if variant is a maritime patrol aircraft capable of shipborne operations. Though its basic design was becoming obsolete, the mature design was given a maritime camouflage and anti-submarine bombs. This what-if variant is an upgraded anti-submarine patrol aircraft designed for operating off certain IJA carriers. This unit piloted by skilled airmen will be a powerful maritime asset.
零戦の最終的な量産型「零式艦上戦闘機52丙型」です。\n武装及び防御力が強化され: The "Zero Fighter Model 52C" was the last mass-produced variant of the Zero. Its armaments and armor have been upgraded in exchange for some mobility. The "Hachiman Squadron" was formed and deployed to Iwo Jima to attack and destroy enemy carriers from the air. Faced with overwhelming numbers of US carrier aircraft, it was destroyed without offering much resistance.
あの戦いの前半期活躍した一式陸攻と内地後方の精鋭搭乗員を\nかき集めて編成された: The land-based attack section of the Hachiman Force was formed by gathering the elite crew who flew Type 1 Attack Aircraft early in the war and from domestic squadrons. It was deployed to the front at Iwo Jima with the expectation of great things, but due to problems with timing and accidents, it was destroyed without seeing much action. They will bring great results this time!
当時の日本陸軍の主力戦車、 特徴的な鉢巻アンテナを持つ九\n七式中戦車、通称「チ: The Type 97 medium tank was the principal tank of the Imperial Japanese Army. It has a characteristic headband-shaped antenna and was commonly known as the "Chi-Ha Tank". Though it was unsuited for straight-up fights with newer tanks of the other great powers, it was produced in large numbers and used as the main tank of the IJA. At the Battle of Shimushu, the 11th Tank Regiment fought bravely and sustained many casualties. An upgraded Chi-Ha with better anti-tank capability was also in development.
当時の日本陸軍の主力戦車、九七式中戦車、通称「チハ車」。\n歩兵支援に主眼をおい: The Type 97 medium tank was the main tank of the Imperial Japanese Army, commonly known as the "Chi-Ha". In order to improve the Chi-Ha's anti-armor capability for its role as infantry support, the "Chi-Ha Kai" was equipped with a new main gun with better penetration power. In some situations, it was able to overcome armored forces of the other great powers.
完全武装した、陸軍歩兵部隊です。\n三八式歩兵銃や手榴弾だけでなく、軽機関銃や擲: A fully armed army infantry unit. Equipped with not only Type 38 rifles and hand grenades, but also light machine guns and grenade launchers. However, they cannot maneuver at sea without support.
当時の日本陸軍の主力戦車、九七式中戦車、通称「チハ車」。\n列強の新型戦車との対: The Type 97 medium tank was the main tank of the Imperial Japanese Army, commonly known as the "Chi-Ha". Though it was unsuited for straight-up fights with newer tanks of the other great powers, it was produced in large numbers and used as the main tank of the IJA. At the Battle of Shimushu, the 11th Tank Regiment fought bravely and sustained many casualties.
